about_the_game:
“...On the other side, there’s Lucy B. Her appearance differs completely, but instead, she contains Lucy’s memories. Which Lucy is the one that master truly desires?”



This DLC is for those who want to meet and experience the classic version of Lucy.
The patch allows you to switch drawing styles of all Characters and Event CGs back to the original version, which was released in 2010.

Please note that game plot/music/UI/Background CGs does not change.
detailed_description:
How to apply

Once the patch is downloaded, please make sure that the DLC is enabled.
Then, you can simply turn on/off the Classic Skin from the option menu in the game.
